name: Quick Rajma (Red Kidney Bean Curry) Vegan Gluten Free
description: Quick Rajma (Red Kidney bean curry). Indian curried Kidney Beans with spices. Rajma Masala Recipe. Vegan Gluten-free soy-free.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 to 1 teaspoon kashmiri garam masala or garam masala or chana masala blend
1 inch ginger chopped ((can be substituted with ginger paste))
4 to 5 cloves of garlic peeled and chopped ((can be substituted with garlic paste))
1/2  green chili chopped or to taste
1 15 oz can dark red kidney beans ((drained or 2/3 cup dry kidney beans, soaked overnight or atleast 4 hours))

recipeInstructions.text: In a pressure cooker or Instant Pot, add oil and heat on medium heat. Add onions.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pressure cooker or Instant Pot, add oil and heat on medium heat. Add onions.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook until onions are translucent. Add in the spices, kashmiri garam masala, bay leaf, asofetida, chili, ginger, garlic and mix well for half a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook until onions are translucent. Add in the spices, kashmiri garam masala, bay leaf, asofetida, chili, ginger, garlic and mix well for half a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the chopped tomato and cook on medium low on stove top, partially covered with occasional stirring for 10-12 minutes, till tomatoes are mushy and leave the sides of the pan. (In the Instant pot, add a generous splash of water and stir frequently to cook until tomatoes are tender)
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the chopped tomato and cook on medium low on stove top, partially covered with occasional stirring for 10-12 minutes, till tomatoes are mushy and leave the sides of the pan. (In the Instant pot, add a generous splash of water and stir frequently to cook until tomatoes are tender)

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the lemon juice salt, sugar and red kidney beans and 1 cup of water for cooked and 1.5 cups of water for soaked kidney beans.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the lemon juice salt, sugar and red kidney beans and 1 cup of water for cooked and 1.5 cups of water for soaked kidney beans.

recipeInstructions.text: Pressure cook for 2 whistles on medium high and 3 to 4 whistles on medium-low heat for uncooked soaked beans. (Manual 15 minutes for cooked/canned, 25 minutes for uncooked soaked beans, at high pressure.). Let the pressure release naturally. Mash some of the kidney beans with the spatula.
recipeInstructions.name: Pressure cook for 2 whistles on medium high and 3 to 4 whistles on medium-low heat for uncooked soaked beans. (Manual 15 minutes for cooked/canned, 25 minutes for uncooked soaked beans, at high pressure.). Let the pressure release naturally. Mash some of the kidney beans with the spatula.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot topped with lemon wedges, cilantro, garam masala and Rotis or Naans(flat breads) or fresh Basmati rice. Quick and fun everyday Kidney beans curry.
